physical_appearance: The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features a group of seven people. Several of them are looking in the direction where the photograph was captured. Most of them are bare-chested and only wearing their military shorts and boots. They are also smoking cigarettes and one of them is holding a bottle. A military truck is behind them to the right. On the other side behind them to the left, there are several people and another military truck.
title_text: Group of Military Personnel Photography Album (donation from Anthony Robert Saint Claire)
subject_terms_2: Black-and-white photography Portraits, Group Portrait photography Soldiers
